headline.main: BRITISH SHELL ORDER REVEALS NEW SYSTEM; Fuses to New Zealand, Cases to Australia, Filling to India

lead_paragraph: WELLINGTON, New Zealand, Nov. 4 -- The first move in a plan designed to put the whole British Empire on the production line was announced here today by Munitions Minister D.G. Sullivan. Mr. Sullivan revealed that the government had accepted a "huge" contract for shell fuses that would possibly affeet every engineering shop in the country and elevate New Zealand to a key point in empire munitions making.
abstract: N Z Min Sullivan reveals shell fuse order puts N Z in key role in empire mass output plan; cases to be made in Australia, filled in India and South Africa and sent to war fronts
